page.title: 08SUPERNATURAL
page.content: A man in Firle told of a ghost called Mr Gibbons. He is said to have lived in the house at one time.The mans son saw the ghost staring at his electric clock. Then he went out to the landing and disappeared. Some time later a man came to stay at the house. He saw the ghost staring at the T.V. Another man once went up on the Downs on Christmas Eve with a bottle of hot whisky. At mid-night herd of big white horses came out of the hedge and galloped away. Some people that live near them saw the horses as well. There is a saying in the area that the Grey Lady is about when a door has been left open and no one has left it open.
